content.query:
CREATE DATABASE CLEAN_POC_DB;

USE CLEAN_POC_DB;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE CleanDeltaLakeStorage
WITH ( location = 'abfss://kannainput@jithendra231221.dfs.core.windows.net/cleanse/MARINE_POC/' );
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CleanDeltaLakeFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA );
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE CLEAN_VALIDATE_SET;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE CLEAN_VALIDATE_SET
(
	ata VARCHAR(255),
	atd VARCHAR(255),
	end_lat VARCHAR(255),
	end_lon VARCHAR(255),
	end_port VARCHAR(255),
	end_port_sea_area VARCHAR(255),
	id VARCHAR(255),
	in_port VARCHAR(255),
	lat VARCHAR(255),
	lon VARCHAR(255),
	mmsi VARCHAR(255),
	node VARCHAR(255),
	speed VARCHAR(255),
	start_port VARCHAR(255),
	timestamp VARCHAR(255),
	vessel_type VARCHAR(255),
	voyage VARCHAR(255),
    dq_check INT
)
WITH (
LOCATION = 'VALIDATE_SET_JSON/',
DATA_SOURCE = CleanDeltaLakeStorage,
FILE_FORMAT = CleanDeltaLakeFormat
);



SELECT TOP 10 * FROM CLEAN_VALIDATE_SET;

SELECT DISTINCT DQ_CHECK FROM CLEAN_VALIDATE_SET;
